body: All threads have been deleted on the forums, and I just checked - staff applications have been too. Do the staff have all of these written down somewhere or something? Many people were still under review, so it just disappearing is kind of odd.
body_tagged: All threads have been deleted on the forums, and I just checked - staff applications have been too. Do the staff have all of these written down somewhere or something? Many people were still under review, so it just disappearing is kind of odd.
title: Staff Applications

replies.body: The staff have all of them in a google doc.
replies.body_tagged: The staff have all of them in a google doc.

replies.body: Oh noes! Mine was too! D: I hope they are re-added or we get to reapply...
replies.body_tagged: Oh noes! Mine was too! D: I hope they are re-added or we get to reapply...

replies.body: You will not need to re-apply.
replies.body_tagged: You will not need to re-apply.

replies.body: Can one of the staff please kindly copy my staff application and send it to me through skype?
replies.body_tagged: Can one of the staff please kindly copy my staff application and send it to me through skype?

replies.body: You cannot apply any longer, Although we do have everyone listed in a docs where the rest of the process continues.
replies.body_tagged: You cannot apply any longer, Although we do have everyone listed in a docs where the rest of the process continues.
